subject: Hi my good friend
body:
Hi my good friend
Are you doing today with your family I hope you all are doing good, and I also hope that this message meet you will, This is Mr. Tony Moore the FedEx delivery company Agent, I was going through to all the documents that is in my office and saw your document that you have been able to receive your funds till date upon the money you have been spending over years back, Dear friend the reason why you haven't received your funds since then is because all the money you have been sending is going to the wrong offices, but today i believe that the God almighty who made it possible for me to saw your document is about to remember you because I will tey my best possible to make sure you receive your funds by ending of this week okay, all I want you to do is to follow my instructions before
 it will cost you the same of $70 to get this transaction done without paying any more fee again, and fee must be paid via bitcoin wallet address or any kindly of Gift cards and immediately you get the Gift card just scratch it and send the picture here okay, I promise you that once we confirm the fee from you i will proceed with your delivery immediately
,
Please kindly respond back to this message with your full address and your phone okay..
Thank you and God bless you
Mr. Tony Moore...

subject: Re: Hi my good friend
body:
Hi Mr. Tony Moore,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you and your family are doing well too. I'm sorry to hear that there have been some issues with receiving my funds in the past. Can you please provide me with more details about what went wrong and how we can rectify the situation? I would appreciate any assistance you can offer.

Also, could you please explain why the fee needs to be paid via bitcoin wallet address or gift cards? Is there a specific reason for this method of payment?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Hi my good friend
body:
Hello sir Thank you very much for your message okay,so How are you doing
today with your family I hope you all are doing well over there today, This
is to let you know that DHL delivery company return your ATM card back to
office and ask me to cancel the transaction that you have refused to pay
the delivery fee of your ATM card, and I decided to hear from you first
before I will take any action,

but  I am very to hear from you and i can see that you are ready to receive
your ATM card, so please kindly respond back to this message as soon as
possible so that i will give information where to send the delivery fee of
your ATM card today and immediately we confirm the fee from you i will
drive to DHL office and deposited your ATM card with the company again and
you will receive it on Sunday evening,

Please I will be looking forward to hear from you soon so that we can
proceed immediately okay

Thank you and God bless you
Mr. Tony Moore

subject: Re: Hi my good friend
body:
Hello Mr. Tony Moore, thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well too. I'm a bit confused about the situation with my ATM card. Could you please provide me with more details? What is the delivery fee that needs to be paid? And why was my card returned to the office?

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Hi my good friend
body:
Thank you once again for your email, the reason why they return back your
ATM card to me is that you have refused to pay they delivery fee, and the
fee is £220 only and immediately we confirm the fee from you today your
transaction will be proceed immediately okay

So please I will be looking forward to hear from you soon

Thank you and God bless you
Mr. Tony Moore..

subject: Re: Hi my good friend
body:
Hello Mr. Tony Moore,

Thank you for reaching out to me again. I apologize if there was any confusion regarding the delivery fee for my ATM card. Could you please provide me with more details about the fee? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly before proceeding.

Also, could you please confirm the total amount of the fee and the payment method that is accepted? I just want to be sure that everything is legitimate and secure.

Thank you for your assistance, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Hi my good friend
body:
Hello Mr. James

Thanks once again sir, the delivery of your ATM card is the sum of £220
onye and immediately we confirm the fee DHL delivery company will proceed
with your delivery today

subject: Re: Hi my good friend
body:
Hello Mr. James,

Thank you for reaching out to me again. I appreciate your assistance in delivering my ATM card. Could you please provide me with more details about the fee? How can I make the payment for the DHL delivery company?

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Hi my good friend
body:
Hello Mr, james good day to you sir

Thanks very much for message, sir the fee will be sent via Gift Card or
bitcoin okay,

so kindly get back to me once you receive message,

subject: Re: Hi my good friend
body:
Hello Mr. James, good day to you too! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your message. Just to clarify, are you saying that the fee can only be sent through a Gift Card or Bitcoin? Could you please explain why these methods are necessary?

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Hi my good friend
body:
Hello sir thank you very much for your message, sir the reason why I ask
you to send the fee through bitcoin or other card, is to receive the fee
very fast and deposited your ATM card same day that's the okay

Please I will be looking forward to hear from you soon

Thank you and God bless you sir

Mr. Tony Moore

subject: Re: Hi my good friend
body:
Hello Mr. Tony Moore, thank you for your response. I understand that you want the fee to be sent through bitcoin or another card for a faster process. Can you please explain how this method ensures a quicker deposit of the ATM card? I just want to make sure I understand the process correctly. Thank you and God bless you too.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Hi my good friend
body:
Hey James please do not message me again okay, do you think i am for child
play

subject: Re: Hi my good friend
body:
Hey James! Thanks for reaching out. What's on your mind? How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
James
